description: When you stay at Holiday Inn Express Bath, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Bath Abbey and Roman Baths. You can unwind with a drink at the bar/lounge, and free hot/cold buffet breakfast is available daily between 6:30 AM and 9:30 AM. All rooms offer flat-screen TVs, pillow menus, and free WiFi.

DESCRIPTION.value: When you stay at Holiday Inn Express Bath, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Bath Abbey and Roman Baths. You can unwind with a drink at the bar/lounge, and free hot/cold buffet breakfast is available daily between 6:30 AM and 9:30 AM. All rooms offer flat-screen TVs, pillow menus, and free WiFi.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. Guests can enjoy a complimentary breakfast each morning. High-speed wireless Internet access is complimentary.

Event facilities measuring 484 square feet (45 square meters) include a meeting room. This Bath hotel also offers laundry facilities, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Limited complimentary onsite parking is available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Holiday Inn Express Bath is a smoke-free property.

DINING.value: A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is served each morning between 6:30 AM and 9:30 AM.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Express Bath is Bristol (BRS-Bristol Intl.) - 22.9 km / 14.2 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Location
Located in the heart of Bath, this hotel is within a 15-minute walk of Herschel Museum of Astronomy and Theatre Royal Bath. Roman Baths and Bath Abbey are also within 1 mi (2 km).

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Pet fee: GBP 20.00 per pet, per night

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.
